books.title: Genesis
books.description: In the beginning, God created the Heavens and the Earth. So God created mankind in his own image, in the image of God he created them; male and female he created them.

books.title: Exodus
books.description: Honor your father and your mother, so that you may live long in the land the Lord your God is giving you.

books.title: Leviticus
books.description: Do not seek revenge or bear a grudge against anyone among your people, but love your neighbor as yourself. I am the Lord.

books.title: Numbers
books.description: The Lord is slow to anger, abounding in love and forgiving sin and rebellion. Yet he does not leave the guilty unpunished

books.title: Deuteronomy
books.description: Hear, O Israel: The Lord our God, the Lord is one. Love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your strength.

books.title: Joshua
books.description: But if serving the Lord seems undesirable to you, then choose for yourselves this day whom you will serve,
